Hi~

Network to the pcm (16bit, 38.1Khz sample rate, 1-Channel (Mono)) data to me.
The size of received data at a time of about 0.43 seconds 16384byte and audio data.
Using BufferedWaveProvider and IWavePlayer play with the noise is heard.

To play its PCM data in real-time, what should I do?

I'm not sure exactly what you are asking. A buffered wave provider is the best way to play audio you are receiving over the network in real-time.
Also, 38.1kHz is a very non-standard sample rate. Are you sure that is correct?
